definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lead, guide (Ar. nah.a0 go in direction of, turn (eyes) toward) ;—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. sf. [[נׇחַ֫נִי]] Ge 24:27 + 2 t.; [[וְנׇֽחְֲ]] Is 58:11; [[נׇחָם]] Ex 13:17; 2 ms. [[נׇחִ֫יתָ]] Ex 15:13, Ps 77:21 Imv. [[נְחֵה]] Ex 32:34; sf. [[נְחֵנִי]] Ps 5:9 + 2 t.;—lead, bring, sq. acc. pers., subj. man Ex 32:34 (sq. [[אֶל־]]), cf. Ps 60:11, Ps 108:11 (both sq. [[עַד־]]; ‖[[הוביל]]); usu. subj. ´[[י]] Ge 24:27 (J ; also sq. [[בַּדֶּרֶח]] + acc. loc.), Ex 13:17 (E ; sq. [[דֶּרֶח]]), Ex 15:13 (song; ‖[[נהל]]), Ps 77:21; fig. of guidance in prosperity and righteousness Ps 5:9 (‖[[הושׁר דרך]]), Ps 27:11 (sq. [[בְּאׂרַה]]; ‖[[הורה דרך]]), Ps 139:24 (sq. [[בדרך עולם]]); cf. Is 58:11.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: B.—; of guiding= treating kindly (the helpless) Job 31:18, of guiding constellations Job 38:32 (‖[[הוחיא]]); usu. subj. ´[[י]] Ge 24:48 (J; sq. [[בַּדֶּרֶח]]) De 32:12, Ps 78:14, Ps 78:53, Ps 78:72 (Isr. as flock; ‖[[רעה]]); Is 57:18, Ps 107:30 (sq. [[אֶל־]]); cf. of pillar of cloud Ex 13:21 (J), Ne 9:12, Ne 9:19; also Job 12:23 (‖[[שׁטח]]), Ps 67:5; esp. in path of blessing Ps 23:3, Ps 31:4 (‖[[נהל]]), Ps 61:3 (sq. [[בְּ]]), Ps 73:24; cf. Ps 43:3, Ps 139:10 (‖[[אחז]]), Ps 143:10 (sq. [[בְּ]]); also of instruction, etc., Pr 6:22, Pr 11:3, Pr 18:16 (sq. [[לִפְנֵי]]).
